Title: Relates to content bans and retention of records by online dating services
Summary: Relates to bans from online dating services based on content; requires retention of records where necessary to maintain enforcement of fraud bans or content bans; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง394-c, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to banned members of social referral services
